*fekete*

1\. \[*adjective*\] black \(absorbing all light and reflecting none\)
2\. \[*adjective*\] black \(pertaining to a dark\-skinned ethnic group\)
3\. \[*adjective*\] black \(darker than other varieties, especially of fruits and drinks\)
4\. \[*adjective*\] \(figuratively\) tragic, mournful, black \(causing great sadness or suffering\)
5\. \[*adjective*\] \(figuratively\) black \(derived from evil forces, or performed with the intention of doing harm\)
6\. \[*adjective*\] \(figuratively, in compounds\) illegal \(contrary to or forbidden by criminal law\)
7\. \[*noun*\] black \(color perceived in the absence of light\)
8\. \[*noun*\] black clothes \(especially as mourning attire\)
_\[truncated 3 definitions\]_

Usage examples:

1\. Én vagyok a család fekete báránya\.
  _I'm the black sheep of the family\._

2\. A vörös ruhás nő figyelmen kívül hagyta a fekete ruhás férfit, és mobilon felhívta egy barátját\.
  _The girl in the red dress ignored the man dressed in black and called a friend on her cellphone\._

3\. Két kis nyuszi, egy fehér nyuszi meg egy fekete élt egy nagy erdőben\.
